items.label: 58bf4b085457a30b37d2aaf5
items.name: Residential Energy TOU Schedule 1T
items.description:
This schedule is applicable to separately metered and billed supply of alternating current electricity for use in a single-family residence or "family care home" as defined in Chapter 168, Section 21(1) of the General Statutes of North Carolina.
On-peak hours (Except Certain Holidays)
1. For the period of June 1 through September 30:1 P.M. to 9 P.M., Monday through Friday
2. For the period of October 1 through May 31:6:30 A.M. to 12 noon and 5 P.M. to 9 P.M., Monday through Friday. Off Peak hours are all other hours.
items.energycomments:
Rate = Distribution + Generation + Transmission.
Adjustments = Fuel charge rider A + Biomass conversions + Brunswick County power station + Peak-shaving increment + Energy efficiency increment + Bear Garden generating station + Virginia City hybrid energy center + Transmission rider + Warren County power station + 2016 Solar Programs + Strategic Underground Program + Sales and Use Surcharge
